tool_description: This API allows you to upload your own data for recognition. It is usually used together with the Query API to make recognition requests for the uploaded database.
name: Kooaba Image Recognition Upload
title: Kooaba Image Recognition Upload

api_list.name: Index
api_list.description: Returns a list of buckets the API user has access to.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-kooaba-image-recognition-upload.p.rapidapi.com/buckets"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-kooaba-image-recognition-upload.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-kooaba-image-recognition-upload.p.rapidapi.com/buckets"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-kooaba-image-recognition-upload.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List items
api_list.description: List the items in a bucket. Up to 100 items are returned for each page.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Number. The page number for the items to list. The first page is page 0. (e.g. /api/v4/buckets/:bucketUUID/items?page=0)

api_list.name: Get an item
Get the status of an item
